meanings.definition: The quality or state of being noisy.
meanings.sent1: The noisiness of the construction site made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't sleep because of the noisiness of the party next door.
meanings.sent3: The noisiness of the chirping birds woke me up with a start.
meanings.sent4: The noisiness of the thunderstorm drowned out all other sounds.
meanings.sent5: The noisiness of the traffic outside was like a constant drumbeat.

meanings.definition: The tendency to make loud or disruptive sounds.
meanings.sent1: Her laughter echoed through the room, adding to the noisiness of the gathering.
meanings.sent2: The noisiness of the children playing in the park was a joyful cacophony.
meanings.sent3: The noisiness of the dog's barking startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The noisiness of the fireworks filled the night sky with bursts of color and sound.
meanings.sent5: The noisiness of the alarm clock jolted him awake every morning.
